data.text:
PROJECT: Meggitt Aerospace US Headquarters, Simi Valley, CA

CLIENT: Ware+Malcomb

LOCATION: Simi Valley, CA

Meggitt Aerospace launches US Headquarters with high-flying Brand presentation

Image 4 and Ware+Malcomb partner to create a world-class corporate Brand environment for French company Meggitt Aerospace.

PROJECT SERVICES

Graphic Design

Fixture Design

Material Specification/Sourcing

Graphic Production

Fixture Fabrication

Installation

Project Overview

Meggitt Aerospace chose Simi Valley, CA as the location for their US headquarters and first manufacturing facility. Ware+Malcomb Architects asked Image 4 to collaborate on the design for the Brand elements. The presentation had to show the world-class capabilities and breadth of product offered by Meggitt, as well as present corporate values and insight to the Brand differentiators.

The centerpiece Brand element is a 36-foot high acrylic graphic assembly, suspended from ceiling to floor on spring-compression stressed aircraft cable. The design had to accommodate the recent CA earthquake codes, as well as a nearly 4” building expansion from dawn to late afternoon! Image 4’s engineer evaluated the vertical expansion and load of the assembly, and designed a simple and effective “inverted shock absorber” to support the installation.

Conference room wallcovering murals show aircraft that use Meggitt components, and large-scale technical line art presents a technical and engineering feel. Employee areas feature graphics presenting the corporate values, and product accomplishments. Wayfinding was developed for the factory-floor tour, and massive graphics accented the production floor.
